EmailTemplate.subject: Announcing the Alpha 2.0, our new product
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
I'm excited to announce our latest offering the Alpha 2.0. After months of research and development, we finally have it.
Features of the Alpha 2.0 include: 2x performance increase over the Alpha 1.0 5x more reliable than the Alpha 1.0Available in new colorsLet me know if you're interested in the new product.
Thank you,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.Email}
